title: üèà NFL Futures, Win Totals, Division Title Prop Bets (Early Edge Podcast)
description:
Download and follow the Early Edge Podcast! You can find Early Edge on Apple Podcasts, Spotify and wherever else podcasts are found. 

Allan Bell is joined by PropStarz, Dave Richard and John Breech to take a look at the 2022 NFL schedule and pick out the best value futures bets out there.

0:00 - Intro
2:30 - NFC North
10:40 - NFC South
15:35 - NFC East
20:00 - NFC West
27:40 - AFC North
37:00 - AFC South
49:00 - AFC East

ÔªøFollow our FFT team on Twitter: @FFToday, @AdamAizer, @JameyEisenberg, @daverichard, @heathcummingssr, @ctowerscbs, @BenSchragg

You can listen to Fantasy Football Today on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Fantasy Football Today podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Fantasy Football Today podcast."
